title: Should I wait for the iPhone 12 Pro or buy an iPhone 11 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well the 11 Pro Max is bigger, with a bigger screen. That alone makes it better or worse depending on how you feel about big phones (seriously). The 12 Pro is better in basicly every other way, and the 12 not Pro wouldn’t have the telephoto lens, but is otherwise better. Specifically the 11-not Pro had a not-as-good screen as the 11-Pro, the 12-not-Pro does have a screen as good. However while there are a ton of things the 12 is better at, they tend to be small (20% faster CPU is great…but the 11’s CPU is already very fast, will you notice an extra 20%?; the 12 is 4x more drop resistant, or at least the front glass is, do you drop your phone a lot?; 5G is mostly carrier hype, but it is a little faster/lower latency then good LTE, would you notice? …and many more) Oh, the 12 looks different, more like the iPhone 4/5 design. I really really like that look & new color, but that is a personal choice, maybe you don’t. …but really? Given how close those phones are I would say the real way to decide which on is better for any particular person is how much they like the physical size.
